pages.index: WicketGameFantasy | Play Fantasy Wicket Game Win Cash | New Fantasy Sports App WicketGameFantasy Home About How to Play WicketGameFantasy Make Your Top Team Get App link SMS I accept Privacy Policy Advantages of Engaging in Fantasy Wicket Games on WicketGameFantasy By installing the WicketGameFantasy app on your smartphone, you unlock the opportunity to earn cash rewards daily. The app features numerous fantasy skill games such as cricket, football, kabaddi, and basketball, where you can form your dream teams without any cost. Once your virtual team of actual players is set up, you begin accumulating points. Here are some perks of participating in these fantasy sports on the WicketGameFantasy App: Effortless access to a wide range of skilled online fantasy games like kabaddi, cricket, football, and basketball. In every fantasy game, you have the option to select from a variety of real-life players on the WicketGameFantasy App. Free practice matches where you can utilize your strategic skills and insights. An opportunity to win cash rewards every day. You accumulate points based on your team's actual performance, such as their batting score, bowling figures, goals, and more. Your cash rewards increase depending on the number of points your team earns from players' real-world performances in their games. You can modify your teams before the matches start to create the ideal virtual lineup. You can check each player's current ranking and economy rate, then combine players to form a strong team. You even get to select your own captain and vice-captain to lead a robust team of 11 players. You get to decide which competition to join once your team is ready. You can instantly withdraw your cash rewards without any fees. The best part is the availability of various competitions and games daily, allowing you to continuously adjust your team to achieve top rankings and win substantial cash rewards. Your Favourite Wicket Game in Fantasy Top Batsmen Select the best batsmen and win significant cash rewards! Leading Bowlers Choose the top bowlers and secure daily wins! All-Rounders Create a balanced team with top all-rounders and dominate the game! Fielding Stars Pick the best fielders and catch your way to victory! How to Download and Install the Best Fantasy Wicket Game App in the India? You can quickly download the WicketGameFantasy app on your smartphone via SMS Link. The fantasy app is available for both Android and iOS users.Step 1 - Visit the India' no.1 Fantasy Wicket Site.Step 2- Enter your mobile number to receive a link to download the app via text message. Step 3- Click on the link in your SMS to install and download the WicketGameFantasy App Step 4- You can also scan the QR code on the website to install the WicketGameFantasy App. OrStep 1-Open wicketgamefantasy.com on your mobile browser Step 2- Click the download button to install the Fantasy Wicket Game AppAfter downloading the WicketGameFantasy app, you can create an account by entering your mobile number registered with Paytm and log in using OTP or Password. If you don't have a Paytm account, you can still sign up with a few simple steps. How to Play WicketGameFantasy Step 1: Register Sign up on WicketGameFantasy using your email address and mobile number. Verify your account through OTP. Step 2: Select a Match Choose a match from the list of upcoming games. You can participate in various formats and leagues. Step 3: Create Your Team Assemble your fantasy team by selecting real-life players. Choose your captain and vice-captain wisely. Step 4: Join Contests Enter your team into various contests. You can join free or cash contests to compete with other players. Step 5: Monitor Your Team Track your team's performance in real-time. Earn points based on your players' actual performance in the match. Step 6: Win and Withdraw Win cash prizes based on your team's performance. Withdraw your winnings directly to your bank account securely. FAQs What is WicketGameFantasy? + In the Netherlands, cricket is more than just a sport; it is a passion. On WicketGameFantasy, you can join contests for every format of international cricket. Users can also play online cricket games from various cricket leagues worldwide, including the IPL, as well as ICC matches and tournaments. What is the process for joining and playing a fantasy wicket game on WicketGameFantasy? You only need your email address and mobile number to register. The game includes rules to ensure fair play for all participants. How secure is it to add money to WicketGameFantasy? + Adding money to your WicketGameFantasy account is both easy and secure. With WicketGameFantasy, you can choose from various payment options to ensure the safety of your personal information. Additionally, WicketGameFantasy allows you to withdraw your winnings directly to your bank account after verifying your personal details. How do I sign up on WicketGameFantasy? + It’s a breeze! Getting verified through OTP on our Fantasy Sports Platform is straightforward. Once you’re on WicketGameFantasy, fill out the short form to start playing. How do I receive my winnings? + IMPS withdrawals should be credited within three working days or almost immediately. NEFT should be credited within three working days. How many accounts can I create with the same email address on WicketGameFantasy? + Only one account can be created per email address on WicketGameFantasy. Our Fair Play Policy prohibits users from creating multiple accounts. Why can't I log in to my WicketGameFantasy account? + We apologize for the inconvenience! Please ensure you’ve entered the correct mobile number and password, and try again. If you still cannot log in, click on “Forgot Password” and enter your registered number. We will send you an OTP to reset your password. Follow the instructions to regain access and continue playing fantasy sports on WicketGameFantasy.
